title: Peimine promotes microglial polarization to the M2 phenotype to attenuate drug-resistant epilepsy through suppressing the TLR4/NF-κB/HIF-1α signaling pathway in a rat model and in BV-2 microglia
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Chongchong Liu, Jiangyan Sun, Xiaoming Shen, Shefang Li, Sha Luo, Na Chen, Yunke Zhang
